icon-size.description: The size of the icon, the default unit is px

gutter.description: The spacing between the grids, the default unit is px
gutter.description_zh: 格子之间的间距，默认单位为px

border.description: Whether or not to display a border

center.description: Whether or not to center the contents of the grid
center.description_zh: 是否将格子内容居中显示

square.description: Whether or not to fix the lattice as a square
square.description_zh: 是否将格子固定为正方形

clickable.description: Whether to turn on grid click feedback
clickable.description_zh: 是否开启格子点击反馈

direction.description: The direction in which the contents of the grid are arranged, optionally horizontal
direction.description_zh: 格子内容排列的方向，可选值为 horizontal

reverse.description: Whether to swap the position of icons and text
reverse.description_zh: 是否调换图标和文本的位置
